# Welcome

This is the course hub for **PS51020A R Labs**, teaching R for psychological research at Goldsmiths, University of London.

::: {.callout-tip}
## Getting Started

If this is your first time here:

1. Access the [RStudio Server](https://psy909.gold.ac.uk/rstudioserver/){target="_blank"} and check you can login correctly
2. You need to use your `@campus.goldsmiths.ac.uk` username, such as `jbond007@campus.goldsmiths.ac.uk`
3. All datasets used in this course are available to download from the VLE or the internet
:::

# What You'll Learn

By the end of Lab 1, you will be able to:

- Load, inspect, and clean data in R
- Calculate descriptive statistics and reverse-score questionnaire items
- Create publication-quality visualisations with ggplot2
- Write APA-style results sections
- Use Quarto for reproducible reports
